title: Zaryte crossbow

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Zaryte crossbow is a ranged weapon that requires a Ranged level of 80 to wield, and can fire up to and including dragon bolts. Unlike other crossbows, the Zaryte crossbow grants defensive bonuses. It is one of two crossbows with a Prayer bonus, along with the Armadyl crossbow from which it is crafted. The crossbow has an attack range of 8, and the longrange combat style will increase it by 2. It is only outclassed by the Dragon hunter crossbow when fighting draconic monsters.

Item ID26374

The Zaryte crossbow is a ranged weapon that requires a Ranged level of 80 to wield, and can fire up to and including dragon bolts. Unlike other crossbows, the Zaryte crossbow grants defensive bonuses. It is one of two crossbows with a Prayer bonus, along with the Armadyl crossbow from which it is crafted. The crossbow has an attack range of 8, and the longrange combat style will increase it by 2. It is only outclassed by the Dragon hunter crossbow when fighting draconic monsters.

The crossbow itself is crafted by attaching a nihil horn, obtained as a rare drop from Nex, with an Armadyl crossbow and 250 nihil shards. The Zaryte crossbow counts as a Zarosian item, but not as an Armadylean item in the God Wars Dungeon. In addition, the crossbow possesses a special attack as well as a passive effect.

Passive effect[edit | edit source]

The Zaryte crossbow has a passive effect that strengthens the effects of enchanted bolts by 10%. For example, with enchanted ruby bolts, the bolt's special effect, Blood Forfeit, would deal 22% of the opponent's current hitpoints with a cap of 110 damage, rather than the usual 20% damage and 100 hitpoint damage cap.

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player performing the Zaryte crossbow's special attack, Evoke, with enchanted diamond bolts.

The Zaryte crossbow has a special attack, Evoke, which consumes 75% of the player's special attack energy. The special attack provides doubled accuracy on the next shot, and guarantees the special effect of any enchanted bolts used, providing that the player lands a successful hit on the target.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • Concept art of the Zaryte crossbow by Mod Jerv.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 February 2022
(update)

Using the crossbow's special attack now correctly applies the teleport-blocking effect that exists when using offensive special attacks in PvP combat.

12 January 2022
(update)

The crossbow's passive effect has been added to the Worn Equipment set bonus interface.

5 January 2022
(update | poll)

The item is now obtainable.

16 December 2021
(update)

The item was added to the game, but was unobtainable.

[[File:Zaryte crossbow detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''Zaryte crossbow''' is a [[ranged weapon]] that requires a [[Ranged]] level of 80 to wield, and can fire up to and including [[dragon bolts]]. Unlike other [[Crossbow (weapon)|crossbows]], the Zaryte crossbow grants defensive bonuses. It is one of two crossbows with a [[Prayer]] bonus, along with the [[Armadyl crossbow]] from which it is crafted. The crossbow has an [[attack range]] of 8, and the longrange combat style will increase it by 2. It is only outclassed by the [[Dragon hunter crossbow]] when fighting [[draconic]] monsters.

The crossbow itself is crafted by attaching a [[nihil horn]], obtained as a rare drop from [[Nex]], with an [[Armadyl crossbow]] and 250 [[nihil shard]]s. The Zaryte crossbow counts as a [[Zaros]]ian item, but not as an [[Armadyl]]ean item in the [[God Wars Dungeon]]. In addition, the crossbow possesses a [[special attack]] as well as a [[passive effect]].

==Passive effect==
The Zaryte crossbow has a [[passive effect]] that strengthens the effects of [[enchanted bolt]]s by 10%. For example, with [[ruby bolts (e)|enchanted ruby bolts]], the bolt's special effect, ''Blood Forfeit'', would deal 22% of the opponent's current [[hitpoints]] with a cap of 110 damage, rather than the usual 20% damage and 100 hitpoint damage cap.

==Special attack==
[[File:Evoke.gif|thumb|280px|A player performing the Zaryte crossbow's special attack, ''Evoke'', with [[Diamond bolts (e)|enchanted diamond bolts]].]]
The Zaryte crossbow has a [[special attack]], ''Evoke'', which consumes 75% of the player's special attack energy. The special attack provides doubled accuracy on the next shot, and guarantees the special effect of any [[enchanted bolt]]s used, providing that the player lands a [[successful hit]] on the target.
